mapper.select: SELECT c.SEQ, c.BOARD_SEQ, c.PARENT_SEQ, c.CNTN, c.DEPTH, c.LIKE_CNT, c.DISLIKE_CNT, c.SECRET_YN, c.RGST_EMP_ID, c.UPDT_EMP_ID, c.DEL_YN, c.DEL_DATE, c.REG_EMP_ID, c.UPD_EMP_ID, c.REG_DATE, c.UPD_DATE, rgst.EMP_NM as rgstEmpNm, updt.EMP_NM as updtEmpNm FROM TB_EMP_RIGHTS_COMMENT c LEFT JOIN TB_EMP_LST rgst ON c.RGST_EMP_ID = rgst.EMP_ID AND rgst.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN TB_EMP_LST updt ON c.UPDT_EMP_ID = updt.EMP_ID AND updt.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE c.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} AND c.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY c.REG_DATE ASC

SELECT c.SEQ, c.BOARD_SEQ, c.PARENT_SEQ, c.CNTN, c.DEPTH, c.LIKE_CNT, c.DISLIKE_CNT, c.SECRET_YN, c.RGST_EMP_ID, c.UPDT_EMP_ID, c.DEL_YN, c.DEL_DATE, c.REG_EMP_ID, c.UPD_EMP_ID, c.REG_DATE, c.UPD_DATE, rgst.EMP_NM as rgstEmpNm, updt.EMP_NM as updtEmpNm FROM TB_EMP_RIGHTS_COMMENT c LEFT JOIN TB_EMP_LST rgst ON c.RGST_EMP_ID = rgst.EMP_ID AND rgst.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN TB_EMP_LST updt ON c.UPDT_EMP_ID = updt.EMP_ID AND updt.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE c.SEQ = #{seq} AND c.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EMP_RIGHTS_COMMENT ( BOARD_SEQ, PARENT_SEQ, CNTN, DEPTH, LIKE_CNT, DISLIKE_CNT, SECRET_YN, RGST_EMP_ID, UPDT_EMP_ID, DEL_YN, REG_EMP_ID, UPD_EMP_ID, REG_DATE, UPD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{boardSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cntn,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, COALESCE(#{depth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0), COALESCE(#{likeCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0), COALESCE(#{dislikeCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0), COALESCE(#{secretYn,jdbcType=CHAR}, 'N'), #{rgstEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updtEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', #{rgstEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updtEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_EMP_RIGHTS_COMMENT SET CNTN = #{cntn,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, SECRET_YN = #{secretYn,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDT_EMP_ID = #{updtEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_EMP_ID = COALESCE(#{updtEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rgstEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), UPD_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE TB_EMP_RIGHTS_COMMENT SET DEL_YN = 'Y', DEL_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UPD_EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE TB_EMP_RIGHTS_COMMENT SET LIKE_CNT = LIKE_CNT + 1 WHERE SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE TB_EMP_RIGHTS_COMMENT SET LIKE_CNT = GREATEST(LIKE_CNT - 1, 0) WHERE SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE TB_EMP_RIGHTS_COMMENT SET DISLIKE_CNT = DISLIKE_CNT + 1 WHERE SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE TB_EMP_RIGHTS_COMMENT SET DISLIKE_CNT = GREATEST(DISLIKE_CNT - 1, 0) WHERE SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
